title: 88/512/EEC: Council Decision of 26 September 1988 concerning the conclusion of a Cooperation Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Republic of Finland on research in the field of wood, including cork, as a renewable raw material
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 26 September 1988 concerning the conclusion of a Cooperation Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Republic of Finland on research in the field of wood, including cork, as a renewable raw material  (88/512/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Cooperation Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Republic of Finland on research in the field of wood, including cork, as a renewable raw material is hereby approved on behalf of the Community.
The text of the Agreement is attached to this Decision.
The President of the Council shall give the notification provided for in Article 10 of the Agreement (5).
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 September 1988.
For the Council The President Th. PANGALOS (6) OJ No C 153, 11. 6. 1988, p. 10.
(7) OJ No C 235, 12. 9. 1988.
(8) OJ No L 159, 14. 6. 1986, p. 36.
(9) OJ No L 71, 14. 3. 1987, p. 29.
(10) The date of entry into force of the Agreement will be published in the Official Journal of the European Communities by the General Secretariat of the Council.
